title: Task 1: Explain how a work demonstrates continuity within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the screen with the siege of Belgrade and a hunting scene references established artistic traditions.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the screen with the siege of Belgrade and a hunting scene references established artistic traditions.
Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the screen with the siege of Belgrade and a hunting scene references established artistic traditions.

title: Task 3: Explain why a work of art demonstrates change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: The response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain HOW the screen with the siege of Belgrade and a hunting scene demonstrates artistic exchange between multiple cultures.
